21 years have passed and not a day goes by when we do not think and speak of you. We love and miss you. Lipman & Carreiro Families

docs.snippet: ROTHKOPF--Bertram Lee, passed on June 3, 2015. Bert was the father of Lisa (Gendal-Buchalter), Richard Rothkopf and Mitchell Rothkopf (deceased) and father-in-law to Perry Buchalter and Laurie Rothkopf Bert was married to Carol Kristel who passed ...
docs.lead_paragraph:
ROTHKOPF--Bertram Lee,

passed on June 3, 2015. Bert was the father of Lisa (Gendal-Buchalter), Richard Rothkopf and Mitchell Rothkopf (deceased) and father-in-law to Perry Buchalter and Laurie Rothkopf Bert was married to Carol Kristel who passed in 2003. Bert is also survived by his brother and sister-in-law Gene and Rita Rothkopf and his grandchildren. Graveside services will be held on Sunday, June 7, 2015 at Mount Carmel Cemetery, Queens at 10:30am. The family will sit Shiva at the home of Rita and Gene Rothkopf on Sunday, June 7, 2015 from 3-10pm

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GILBERT, S. PARKER

docs.snippet: GILBERT--S. Parker. The members and staff of The Bathing Corporation of Southampton mourn the passing of our former President and Director, S. Parker Gilbert. He was greatly valued, and will be long remembered, for his sound judgment and effective...
docs.lead_paragraph:
GILBERT--S. Parker.

The members and staff of The Bathing Corporation of Southampton mourn the passing of our former President and Director, S. Parker Gilbert. He was greatly valued, and will be long remembered, for his sound judgment and effective leadership. We extend our deepest sympathies to his family.

headline.main: U.S., Allies Target Islamic State With 19 Air Strikes: Task Force
headline.print_headline: U.S., Allies Target Islamic State With 19 Air Strikes: Task Force

docs.snippet: The United States and its allies have conducted 15 air strikes targeting Islamic State militants in Iraq since early on Thursday and an additional four targeting them in Syria, the Combined Joint Task Force carrying out the operations said on Frid...
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States and its allies have conducted 15 air strikes targeting Islamic State militants in Iraq since early on Thursday and an additional four targeting them in Syria, the Combined Joint Task Force carrying out the operations said on Friday.

headline.main: Gambia Expels European Union's Top Diplomat; No Reason Stated
headline.print_headline: Gambia Expels European Union's Top Diplomat; No Reason Stated

docs.snippet: The government of Gambia has expelled the European Union's top diplomat in the West African state, the Foreign Ministry said in a statement on Friday, but gave no further details....
docs.lead_paragraph: The government of Gambia has expelled the European Union's top diplomat in the West African state, the Foreign Ministry said in a statement on Friday, but gave no further details.

headline.main: Southern California City Reopens Beach After Tar Cleanup
headline.print_headline: Southern California City Reopens Beach After Tar Cleanup

docs.snippet: The Southern California port city of Long Beach has reopened a 4-mile stretch of beach closed since midweek, when tar balls from an unknown source washed ashore....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Southern California port city of Long Beach has reopened a 4-mile stretch of beach closed since midweek, when tar balls from an unknown source washed ashore.

headline.main: FIFA May Be Embroiled in Scandal but Its Women's World Cup Set to Be Hit With Fans
headline.print_headline: FIFA May Be Embroiled in Scandal but Its Women's World Cup Set to Be Hit With Fans

docs.snippet: With a bribery scandal enveloping FIFA it might seem like a bad time for soccer's governing body to hold the Women's World Cup in Canada - even more so given indictments last week included  top officials from the North American and Caribbean regio...
docs.lead_paragraph: With a bribery scandal enveloping FIFA it might seem like a bad time for soccer's governing body to hold the Women's World Cup in Canada - even more so given indictments last week included  top officials from the North American and Caribbean region on corruption charges.

headline.main: China Ship Disaster Death Toll Jumps, Company Says Sorry
headline.print_headline: China Ship Disaster Death Toll Jumps, Company Says Sorry

docs.snippet: The death toll from a Chinese cruise ship which capsized during a storm in the Yangtze River jumped to 331 on Saturday, leaving around 100 still missing, as the boat operator apologized and said it would cooperate with investigations....
docs.lead_paragraph: The death toll from a Chinese cruise ship which capsized during a storm in the Yangtze River jumped to 331 on Saturday, leaving around 100 still missing, as the boat operator apologized and said it would cooperate with investigations.

docs.snippet: David Lingmerth took a step toward turning his game around with a 7-under 65 at the Memorial on Friday. It gave the Swede a one-shot lead going into a weekend that includes Tiger Woods....
docs.lead_paragraph: David Lingmerth took a step toward turning his game around with a 7-under 65 at the Memorial on Friday. It gave the Swede a one-shot lead going into a weekend that includes Tiger Woods.
